name: BREAKVINE
description:
This game was made for the Weekly Game Jam 201: "Bad Connection" theme

For this jam, I decided to combine "Bad Connection" with how VINEZ in my underwater universe connect. In this game, the "SWIMMERZ" are trying to protect their food, but because of a "Bad Connection" in the surrounding VINEZ, our Player is able to break through and pursue their SEEDLING bounty!

How to Play: Navigate around this platformer by breaking through VINEZ and collecting SEEDLINGZ while avoiding hungry SWIMMERZ! You must be strategic and not go too fast, or you will have to start your collection over again!

Controls:

Move Left - Left Arrow Key / or "A"

Move Right = Right Arrow Key / or "D"

Space Bar - Break Through Green VINEZ

Esc - Exit to Menu/Quit Game

And no jump button - because, why not :)

----------

Thanks for playing! 

-RJ

Indie gamedev and artist - updates of my new games and art on Twitter @SEEDZANDTWIGZ
